programme.title: The Unsung Heroes
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke praises unseen fighter pilots protecting New York.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke praises unseen fighter pilots protecting New York and examines the stepping-up of internal security and the publication of a list of nuclear threats to the US.
